about_the_game:
History: The big 4 grouping companies extensively used flat wagons as a way of transporting various loads unable to be transported by traditional open wagons. This pack includes a selection of these flat wagons used from the early 20th century to late lasting into British Railways service.

This pack includes 4 wagons: GWR Macaw B, LNER 45T Quad Bogie Bolster, LMS Weltrol Wagon, SR Flatrol Wagon. Models made by GreatWesternWorks and Albinopigeon. Models include 3 levels of weathering: Clean, Medium and Heavy and the wagons have Animated Couplings, Vacuums and Handbrakes. and all wagons are in both their Grouping liveries and BR liveries!
